orbit.communications — Communications¶

synopsis

Module to handle computation of inter-satellite communications periods.

class orbitpy.communications.GroundStationComm(user_dir=None, sats_state_dir=None, gnd_stn_fl=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class to handle computation of contact periods between satellites and ground stations.

compute_contacts()[source]¶
class orbitpy.communications.InterSatelliteComm(user_dir, sats_state_dir, opaque_atmos_height_km)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class to handle computation of inter-satellite communication periods. The class takes as input, a directory path containing satellite states present in separate files. As output, it produces periods of contact between any two satellites (in separate files for each possible pair of satellites).

compute_contacts()[source]¶
static los_access(sat1_position_km, sat2_position_km, opaque_atmos_height_km)[source]¶

Algorithm from Page 198 Fundamental of Astrodynamics and Applications, David A.Vallado is used. The first algorithm described is used. theta, theta1, theta2 are as defined in the algorithm. The function returns True if LOS exists between the two satellites, else False.
